[#soil-segregation-form_result-value]
====== Result value

[frame=none, cols="1,5"]
|===
|Property | Value

|Identifier | `urn:shapes:soil-soil-pit-characterization-protocol-shapes:soil-segregation-form:result-value`
|Label | Result value
|Definition | The value of `rdf:value` _MUST_ exist in the Soils segregations forms codes controlled vocabulary.
|Comment | The value in `sosa:hasResult` _MUST_ be a value in `sh:in`, which is the Soils segregations forms codes controlled vocabulary.
include::../../../../statuses/submitted.adoc[]
|Conformance Classes | `TBA`

|Property | Value
|Controlled list items | The result value MUST be from the following list:
